Module com.malvi
Package p4_group_8_repo

Class SpriteAnimation

java.lang.Object
javafx.animation.Animation
javafx.animation.Transition
p4_group_8_repo.SpriteAnimation
public class SpriteAnimation
extends javafx.animation.Transition
This class is used to set animations for the turtles.

  • Constructor Details

    • SpriteAnimation

      public SpriteAnimation​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView imageView, javafx.util.Duration duration, int count, int columns, int offsetX, int offsetY, int width, int height)
      Instantiates the animation.
      Parameters:
      imageView - - class of image.
      duration - - duration of one animation cycle.
      count - - number of frames.
      columns - - number of frames in one row in the image.
      offsetX - - offset of the first frame.
      offsetY - - offset of the first frame.
      width - - width of each frames.
      height - - height of each frames.

  • Method Details

    • interpolate

      public void interpolate​(double k)
      gets interpolated values, which are used to parse through the image frame by frame, creating the animation.
      Specified by:
      interpolate in class javafx.animation.Transition
      Parameters:
      k - - different values of k will be passed to interpolate as animation runs. In the beginning it will be 0.0 and end 1.0.

    • getX

      public int getX()
